emif.c File Reference

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of EMIF. This also contains some related macros. More...

Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of EMIF. This also contains some related macros.

Function Documentation

void EMIFClearIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to clear the interrupt status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to clear status. Refer enum emifIntrSrc_t.
Returns
None.
void EMIFConfigECCClrAllEccErrInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function will clear all EMIF ECC error information.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
Returns
None
void EMIFConfigECCDisableEcc ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function will disable ECC of EMIF Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
Returns
None
void EMIFConfigECCEnableEcc ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function will enable ECC of EMIF Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
Returns
None
int32_t EMIFConfigECCGetEccErrInfo ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  errType,
emifEccErrInfo_t *  pErrInfo 
)

This function will return the EMIF ECC error information of the defined EMIF ECC Error.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
errTypeValue used to represent EMIF ECC Error For valid values refer enum emifEccErrType_t
pErrInfoPointer which hold Error information of the defined EMIF ECC Error For valid values refer enum emifEccErrInfo_t
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
int32_t EMIFConfigECCInitECCParams ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const emifEccCfgPrm_t *  pCfgPrm 
)

This function will intialize the ECC Protected Address range parameters and threshold for 1Bit Error of EMIF Module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of EMIF module register
pCfgPrmPointer which holds ECC configuration parameters of EMIF Module
Returns
STW_SOK on success else STW_EFAIL
void EMIFDisableIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to disable interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to disable. Refer enum emifIntrSrc_t.
Returns
None.
void EMIFEnableIntr ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to enable interrupts.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to enable. Refer enum emifIntrSrc_t.
Returns
None.
uint32_t EMIFGetIntrRawStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API is used to get the raw interrupt status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the EMIF module Registers.
Returns
status Pending interrupt status/occurred.
uint32_t EMIFGetIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This API is used to get the pending interrupts.

Parameters

Returns
